PAPERTRON





(Papertron blinks and turns into The Silly Goon.)



The Sil=
ly Goon: ISABOOBOO!!!...



(The Silly Goon charges towards Nightlight...)
=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2001 12:33 AM
  Subject: Re: Windlo=
rd/Trinity/TO Zero.


  Perplex walks away from Papertron to get away from =
him...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 8:19 PM
    Subject: =
Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


    PAPERTRON




    (Papertron smooshes u=
p again. He looks around the room frowning. He converts to robot mode and r=
emoves a mirror from his wrist compartment. He sits it on the floor and con=
verts to beast mode. He picks the mirror up in his tail and looks at it.)

=


    Papertron: Eeeeeerrrrrrrrrffffffff!!!!....


     
    (He flattens o=
ut to paper and walks towards Perplex...)

      ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 2:57 AM
      Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO=
 Zero.


      Zeni ran as fast as he could from the room.

      Arrow: Pa=
pertron, is that all you're good for? Wait, let me answer that. Yes! Stupid=
 chameleon.

      Arrow left the room...

        ----- Original Message -=
---- 
        From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        S=
ent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 2:54 AM
        Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity=
/TO Zero.


        PAPERTRON




        Papertron: Wha?...Hmm!...YUMMY! Y=
UMMY!...Romaine lettuce is a green leafy thing that is edible but I don't w=
ant to eat it, I just want some so I can run through it and get it stuck to=
 my feet! HEH!....HEH!.....Know who I am? I'm Papertron!!! Holder of 4 iden=
tities!!...Including this one! I am Papertron! I am Apple Furry Murry! I am=
 The Smelly Guy! I am The Silly Goon! HEAR ME ROAR!!!! Isabooboo!!!!...What=
's your name?



        (Papertron awaits a response from Zeni while licki=
ng his lips...)

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: So=
ulstice Omega 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wednes=
day, July 04, 2001 1:25 AM
          Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.=



          Zeni: What's romaine lettuce?...

            ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
            From: *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 1:21 AM
            Subje=
ct: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


            PAPERTRON




            P=
apertron: HEH!...HEH!....Romaine lettuce. I want some but NOT to eat! ERF F=
ER FER FER!....

              ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
From: Soulstice Omega 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          =
    Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 1:14 AM
              Subject: Re: Windl=
ord/Trinity/TO Zero.


              Zeni: What are greens?...

           =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: *Orchid* 
        =
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, July 03,=
 2001 8:23 PM
                Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


    =
            PAPERTRON




                (Papertron smooshes up when Arrow=
 yells. He returns to his normal shape.)



                Papertron: YUMM=
Y YUMMY!!!...



                (Papertron licks his lips.)



           =
     Papertron: Hmm! Okay.



                (Papertron walks up to Zeni.)=




                Papertron: HEH!...HEH!...Do you have any greens? I want=
 some greens but I do NOT want to eat them! HEH!...HEH!...

               =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: Soulstice Omega 
 =
                 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesda=
y, July 03, 2001 7:37 PM
                  Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO=
 Zero.


                  Arrow replies to Papertron.

                  A=
rrow: None of your business, so SHUT UP CHAMELEON!...

                    =
----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: *Orchid* 
         =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, J=
uly 03, 2001 5:28 PM
                    Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Z=
ero.


                    BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON




                    (Bir=
dbot ducked down and was about to jump at Trinity but went back to his norm=
al position after she left and looks at Aerotaur.)



                    B=
irdbot: Can I have a dorito? Give me a dorito...



                    (Pa=
pertron looks at Arrow.)



                    Papertron: You from around =
here? ERF FER FER FER!!!...



                    (Papertron licks his lip=
s....)

                      ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
       From: airly2000@... 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
                      Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 3:20 PM
        =
              Subject: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


                      Tr=
inity::

                      "Uncle Aerotaur, I'll go to play outside bas=
e" said Trinity.

                      "Wait Trinity it's not good idea th=
e you go out alone!!!" said 
                      Windlord, but it was lat=
e she had run where Zero and Zeni were   and 
                      the chi=
ld said "Hello, still do you like play "seek and found" 
                  =
    outside base ?"

                      OOC: I guess that Zeni is with Z=
ero, if he don't, sorry.
